recipe.title: Awesome Roasted Beetroot Dip
recipe.step: Peel and chop beets and place on oven tray. Drizzle 2 tbsp olive oil over beets and toss to coat. Place in moderate preheated (180C) oven for 45 mins, and turn 2 times. Once done allow to cool completely on the tray. Place in blender, with remaining ingredients and blend until desired consistency (about 3-4 minutes.) Serve with something crunchy!
